about_the_game:
"To Be Love With Girls Group" is the world's first real-life interactive video game for nurturing girl groups, produced by "Guanghe Media". Game players will take on the role of a girl group agent from the first perspective in the game to search for and discover girl group trainees, and cultivate them to become formal members of the girl group. Game players can independently choose the story direction with each plot character and master the emotional balance with each plot character. Players will face pressure from senior management in the company, malicious colleagues, and a plethora of candidate trainees, testing whether they can ultimately successfully form a girl group to complete their debut mission and assist the girl group members in breaking through their cocoons. After successfully forming a group, players will be able to continue unlocking the subsequent development content of the Love Girl group through the game. Set off immediately, create your own girl group with your own hands, and ignite your own youth storm!
Game features
·The world's first online and offline game that combines real person development for girl groups. In addition to experiencing a fun process of forming groups and immersing emotional experiences, players can also unlock more new offline content for girl groups through the game.
·The six girls in the plot have very different styles: Hua Ye Xiaoqian, the ancient style department of the folk music department of the Conservatory of Music, Wang Juan, the simple girl from a small town, Ai Li, the cold rock girl, Ma Dongmei, the anime girl from the Northeast, Xu, the stern and caring female boss, and Zhu Yeqing, the eccentric and mysterious female colleague.
·The plot is rich, with multiple branches, multiple endings, and numerous hidden storylines and Easter eggs.

民乐系古风系花YeXiaoQian

东北二次元少女MaDongMei
